articles.title: CWC 2023: BCCI finalizes India squad for ICC World Cup 2023; Sanju Samson excluded- Report - Circle of Cricket
articles.description: India to play Australia on October 8 in Chennai in their World Cup 2023 opener.
articles.content:
The Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) has reportedly, on Saturday finalized the 15-man squad for the forthcoming ICC World Cup 2019, starting next month in India.
